EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace Portal Updates – New January Release
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Here are the latest portal updates and enhancements that have been made:
Pricing Exception – We have expanded the dropdown selections for Pricing Exceptions for Spares orders in include Warranty considerations, HAPP, MPP, MSP and MSA. To view our training page on how to add a pricing exception to your spares order, please click HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics/online-ordering-pricing-exceptions]]>. Portal User Forum - Join our MyAerospace Portal User Forum and be the first to test and provide feedback on new upcoming functionality on our portal. SIGN UP <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/NYHXC7Q]]> To view the individual release notes for the items listed above and to catch up on latest improvements to MyAerospace, please refer to and bookmark our Release Notes page: RELEASE NOTES <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes]]> For training topics pages related to the portal, please refer to and bookmark this page: TRAINING TOPICS <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics]]> Please be sure to Opt-IN to receive important portal enhancement update emails.
